entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Light wet snow over higher terrain late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Local snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
